channel.title: Avoid notifying my replies to my email
channel.description:
For every post I do here, I receive an email with my reply which is unecessary. I haven't done anything differently to other discourse forums and I am thinking it is server configuration.
> You have mailing list mode enabled, so you will be notified of replies to this topic via email.
This doesn't mean I want to send my own post to my mail, only other people posts.

item.title: Avoid notifying my replies to my email
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I am actually glad to get a copy of all posts including my own. As an additional backup.

Read full topic
item.source: Avoid notifying my replies to my email

item.title: Avoid notifying my replies to my email
item.dc:creator: nyxnor
item.description:
Thanks, found the problem.

nyxnor

Joined July 8, 2022

Mailing list mode > Enable mailing list mode
Change
Send me an email for every new post (about 2 per day)
to
Send an email for every new post except my own

Read full topic
item.source: Avoid notifying my replies to my email

item.title: Avoid notifying my replies to my email
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not sure a server setting.

Could you compare please user e-mail preferences:

  • https://forums.kicksecure.com/u/nyxnor/preferences/emails
  • https://forums.whonix.org/u/nyxnor/preferences/emails

?

Note to other readers: replace above user name nyxnor with your own forum user name.

Read full topic
